pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:6.3: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:6.4: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:6.6: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:7.2: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:7.3: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:7.4: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:7.7: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:7.8: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:8.2: “Na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:9.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:10.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:10.5: “Pubbe mayaṃ, āvuso, sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjāma, tena no phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:10.7: ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:10.9: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:10.10: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:11.1: “Na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:12.1: Na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilānena attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk37:12.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
